/* This is the second question of dynamic programming i am doing.
   Dynamic Programming !!!
   A very crucial technique to store the previously obtained results.
*/

#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   int t,start=0,k,j,n;
   long num[8000],pow=1;

   while(start<8000)
   {

     pow=pow*5;

     num[start++]=pow;

     /* num[start++]=pow(5,count++);*/

     k=start-1;

     for(j=0;j<k && start<8000;j++)
     {

       num[start++]=num[k]+num[j];

     }

   }

   /*for(j=0;j<100;j++)
   cout<<num[j]<<endl;*/

   cin>>t;

   while(t--)
   {

    cin>>n;

    cout<<num[n-1]<<endl;

   }

   return 0;

}
